description:
When you want the power transfer of clipless, but need to be ready to hike-a-bike at a moments notice. Whether you’re coming from the world of road riding, or you’re a dirt rider that wants to say “goodbye” to pedal bites, the XC502 are a great clipless trail shoe. The redesigned upper wraps comfortably around your foot and secures with a BOA closure, for that dialled in fit. A stiff fibreglass midsole and low-stack height makes sure all of your pedalling power makes it to your drivetrain. And the generously perforated uppers let air flow through, keeping your feet from comfy on hot days.

  • Synthetic leather upper sheds mud and snow while perforations let your feet breathe
  • Fibreglass reinforced midsole provides an excellent pedalling platform with efficient power transfer
  • Boa® L6 Fit System with micro-adjustments
  • Shimano’s Ultread XC rubber tread offers high traction, and the lug pattern sheds mud easily
  • Spike mounts (18mm option) add grip for tough or icy conditions
  • Low stack height
  • Compatible with 2-bolt cleats
name: Shimano XC502 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
